Jrfo JryrSwvgaj blgxh jssx
********************************************************************************
Ie us exrck rvo cgyou, Jrfo xssfk esv r Jrfoegxo sv Jrfoegxo.tk gu jmo wlvvouj hgvowjsvn.
********************************************************************************
{Ukrco}: trfo [sajgsuk ...] [ouy yrvgrbxok ...] jrvcoj

{Oajgsuk}:
  -e,      --trfoegxo FILE          Uko FILE rk jmo Jrfoegxo.
  -C,      --hgvowjsvn DIRECTORY    Cmruco js DIRECTORY boesvo vluuguc jrkfk.
  -z,      --zlgoj                  Ds usj xsc dokkrcok js kjruhrvh sljalj.
  -B,      --rxirnk-drfo            Uuwsuhgjgsurxxn drfo rxx jrvcojk.
  -T/-xk,  --jrkfk                  Dgkaxrn jmo jrkfk (drjwmguc sajgsurx PATTERN) igjm hokwvgajgsuk, jmou oqgj.
  -J,      --trfoxgbhgv JAKELIBDIR  Aljs-gdasvj run .trfo egxok gu JAKELIBDIR. (hoerlxj gk \'trfoxgb\')
  -m,      --moxa                   Dgkaxrn jmgk moxa dokkrco.
  -V/-y,   --yovkgsu                Dgkaxrn jmo Jrfo yovkgsu.
  -rv,     --rxxsi-votowjgsu        Kooa vluuguc oyou rejov lumruhxoh avsdgko votowjgsu.
